details.spack_dependencies: ^fftw@3.3.10/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' fftw@3.3.10 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi ~openmp) ^gsl@2.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' gsl@2.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^hdf5@1.10.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' hdf5@1.10.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi) ^python@3.8.12/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' python@3.8.12 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^netlib-scalapack@2.1.0/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' netlib-scalapack@2.1.0 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ^openmpi@4.1.3)
